website_summaries.verdict: An innovative option that acts as both a spout cover and a faucet extender. Effectively solves two major bathtime issues.
pros: Multitasking design prevents painful bumps and makes it easier to rinse hair or fill a baby bath
Top opening accommodates a shower diverter
Neutral design might discourage some children from playing with it
cons: Extender can come off when the cover is handled, but it snaps back into place easily

customer_reviews.title: No mold no mildew!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for six months and just took it off to inspect for mold and clean and to my surprise there was no mold!!! As a matter of fact I was even more shocked that there was no filmy residue or anything on the interior. I absolutely love this product. It’s fantastic for bath time as it makes a fun water slide for kids to put their toys on but makes an easy spout for mommy too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised more of this type item isn't readily available. This is adequate and does the job. My tub doesn't have a little raise/lower shower/tub thingy on the spout, so the spout extender isn't super secure. Also, my spout sticks out the front of this extender.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Claire

customer_reviews.title: It definitely does the trick and makes it easy to fill the smaller tub
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to help fill a smaller baby tub that sits in the full size tub. It definitely does the trick and makes it easy to fill the smaller tub. It comes in two pieces, the yellow piece is hard plastic and separates from the aqua piece that fits over the faucet. Both pieces feel like they are decent quality, but since they aren't attached, it's easy to knock the yellow piece out of place and to take it off completely.
customer_reviews.author: momtech2

customer_reviews.title: Handy extension to bathtub outlet
customer_reviews.text: We were using a bucket to collect water for kids to play and earlier without this a lot of water used to flow outside when tried to collect by directly placing the bucket under the bathtub spout. With this no more water wastage and the quality is good and withstands heat even when we turn on just the hot water. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aswath

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. We were looking for something than would protect our sons head from hitting the faucet. Glad I found this one it does the job. It does have to be adjusted so the water doesn't flow backwards but to me that's no big deal, it's meant to fit a range of faucet sizes. Also discovered it works as a mini shower too. On a low water flow, it cascades out nicely and my toddler can take a shower like we do. He thinks it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Ok, entertaining, but not really useful.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, but too flexible. The spout slips forward and dips downward so that the water stream is only deflected a little bit from vertical - and even with 60psi pressure in our pipes, it doesn't come far enough out to allow hair rinsing or anything else useful. It has entertainment value for the kiddos but not really useful for anything I can discover.
customer_reviews.author: Driller

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my little brother and sister (4 and 2) because the bathtub faucet doesn’t extend out very far. I didn’t think it would fit or work but it did! Now they like to put their head under the faucet and let the water run down their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mkg

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to but yellow piece falls out now and then
customer_reviews.text: Its great and does exactly what it is supposed to. Really useful for washing hair especially if you prefer to run water into a bucket first. Directs the water flow and is useful for faucets that have lower pressure where the water just runs straight down. I updated my review and took of an additional star because over time the yellow piece starts falling out of the blue piece. It gets annoying to have to keep reinserting it
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Wall saver
customer_reviews.text: The previous owner of our home did not put a long enough spout on for the water to only go into the tub. It hit the side and ran along the seam while going into the tub. This caused water damage to the wall beside the tub. This extension completely fixed the problem and I'm happy to recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Aponte

customer_reviews.title: A must but!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It makes bath time so much easier. Filling a baby bath tub while holding it so it's under the spout is such a pain! This eliminates that issue and the water that is wasted in the process. It also makes rinsing babies and toddlers so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we have a son who is a) extremely active and b) extremely enthusiastic about bathtime, and we didn't want him to hit his head and hurt himself on the metal faucet. There are pros and cons to this. Pro: the blue part fits onto the faucet fairly easily, and provides a barrier in case he bumps his head. Con: the yellow part comes off easily, and it's become a game for him to take it off right away and play with it. It goes back in easily, but at this point we just leave it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Padilla, Blondie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Bill comes off, causes problems
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product because it is cute; however, it has some major drawbacks. Primary is that the yellow duck bill comes off, and when this happens the water isn't well-directed. Also when the bill is off there is very little protection from the end of the facet. You might think that you'll just never take off the bill, but a 9-24 month old helper will find taking it off very fun while taking a bath. Also, if it is not correctly positioned, the water will go out the back of it possibly flooding out of the tub. Overall, I can't say that this makes bath time any safer or easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Austin

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended But the yellow piece is not attached because it is hard plastic. Makes sense so it does not injure the baby. The yellow piece comes off very easy. I would rather see it all made of a blue material and be one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our bath spout doesn't reach over the toddler tub. I thought I needed to buy a new bath spout (and extension), but this does a great job moving the water into the toddler tub, and adds some padding to soften a head bump.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: "Beak" comes off
customer_reviews.text: This is cute for a kids bath but it's too easy to take the yellow piece off. My toddler can yank it off easily. I would like it more if it was all one piece. It's still nice to have on the tub to extend the water flow so the kids can play and not hit their head on the metal spigot. I think this is a bit expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Koko Black

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet extender, not great as a cushion
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a faucet extender, padding doesn't cover faucet enough to protect against bumped heads. Perfect to fill our inflatable baby bath. Will have to buy another faucet cover though when she has outgrown her baby tub.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane McCan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of being the human extender for my baby's tub. Great buy. Yellow piece comes off.
customer_reviews.author: MimiLadybug

customer_reviews.title: Very useful to give water flow from faucet a direction and reduce water wastage
customer_reviews.text: Very useful to give water flow from faucet a proper direction and reduce water wastage. Very useful with kids fits easily and one of the most useful items I have purchased from amazon
customer_reviews.author: tsuryasai87

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It fits right on our bath spout (standard) and it makes bath time so much easier. I have a 3 month old and I would have to lift the tub to fill it up with water since the spout was short and didn't reach the tub. With this product I can easily fill up the tub and get ready for her bath. It will be also useful to rinse her hair when she's older.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it and it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The beak comes off very easily but it is hard to put back on. Water comes out the back and the front and any tugging to have water come out the front only pushes up the shower diverter. We have a standard 1980s faucet. It works as a nice buffer so the 10mos old doesn't hurt his head.
customer_reviews.author: SWR

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My daughter loves it for her bath, water flows like a waterfall for her. I bought it mainly so I can fill her bath easier and it helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: MaoX

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone w an independent toddler needs one of these. It cleans easily, and serves its purpose well. Water flows out of it at a great angle and now I don't have to worry about my kid bumping his head on the hard bath spout. I take off one star bc based on the angle that you have the spout placed some water can flow outside the back. (The angle changes bc my 1yo plays w it all the time!)
customer_reviews.author: rierie

customer_reviews.title: Clean it often and look inside the cup because black ...
customer_reviews.text: Clean it often and look inside the cup because black mold will accumulate quickly and it is difficult to get off! We eventually threw it out. The cover could use a re-design to have less crevices where mold can grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faucet spout that is safe and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent faucet spout! I love that this acts as a bumper cover for the faucet, and moves the flow of water away from the tub. I even have memories as a kid of trying to shove my head under the faucet and i hated bumping the tub wall! This is a genius invention. My tub faucet is old fashioned and traditional shape and fits perfectly, although I had to squeeze and wiggle it into place. Creates a nice, wide waterfall flow when turned on that my 7 month old loves to watch as the tub fills!
customer_reviews.author: Tess McQuarrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't crazy about it, it takes a little tweaking to get the right fit on the tub faucet. But once I did, I was very happy with the product! It keeps my son's head away from the faucet and he enjoys playing in the water. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loves this thing! The spout ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this thing! The spout comes apart into two parts. The part that covers the faucet it made of a soft silicone material. It has saved us from a few head bumps by itself. The “shoot” if you will, is made of a harder plastic. The two pieces sometimes stay together during bath time but they’re often separated during play.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit faucet
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with our tuba for my daughter easily removed the yellow spout extension. I had high hopes but was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you need it to.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product with the exception of the spout coming off. If they can find a way to permanently attach it this will be a five star item. But if you don’t have to remove it once installed then it doesn’t come apart that easily. It’s only when you have to remove it often.
customer_reviews.author: Eboni

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of bulky to put onto a faucet. We needed up taking it off about a month in because it was blocking out shower pull and also got moldy very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great to fill baby tub in the bathtub!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Having a new baby, I need to use the bath faucet to fill her plastic tub within my tub and the spigot was too close to the wall to fill the little tub. This extends the flow of water out so I can fill her tub easily. So happy I found this. Also works great to fill the humidifier a bit further out from tub wall.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Aquaduck Bath Spout Extender
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, super fun, super simple! Just slide it on and watch your child smile!! I actually bought the bath extender as well as the sink extender but found that the bath extender can work just fine on the sink faucet so I was able to give the sink extender to my son and daughter in law!
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Dines not fit well on faucet. Had to tape it. Leaks too.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bath and if you want to rinse your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! Not only does it protect our daughter from the hard corners, but the angle is perfect for filling the baby tub and now just simply for the toddler bathing. The only downside is it tends to slide off a bit and you have to adjust it frequently but that's pretty minor. My sister and parents were so impressed they ordered them too!
customer_reviews.author: socalphilly

customer_reviews.title: This is great. We use is to fill our baby's inflatable ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We use is to fill our baby's inflatable bathtub that we place in our larger tub. The only downside is that he now likes to pull the yellow extender out of the spout cover.
customer_reviews.author: alison lake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This looks wonky online. but its actually cute in person! It really looks like a ducks bill and keeps my baby's head safe when he is taking a bath. 1 second installation and for our spout, it fits great and doesn't budge when bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a real duck.
customer_reviews.text: So, you can't cook it and eat it. But it does keep the water from landing on the stopper in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work on all showers and didn’t flow water properly
customer_reviews.author: Aisha J

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for this! It serves its purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: lyfe85

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Little one kept pulling the yellow part off so we just took it off. Still protects the hard faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Justen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I needed it to. There's a lip on my daughter's bathtub that made it difficult to fill. This goes over that and the bathtub fills much quicker. Also, I laugh when I see it in the tub and say "oh there you are, Perry!"
customer_reviews.author: Donna Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great over the faucet- does what it’s supposed to do. All around pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Its g a good product. The spout easy slips out when my ...
customer_reviews.text: Its g a good product. The spout easy slips out when my daughter plays with it. But it does the job,.
customer_reviews.author: grisel

customer_reviews.title: It works with limitations
customer_reviews.text: My tub spout has the diverter located in the back so this wasn't a good fit. The yellow beak fell off when the water flow is strong. Otherwise, it does it's job within limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbone

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Easy to wash the kids hair and let them play in the bath. Gave us the 1” or 2 extension that we needed to pass the overflow too.
customer_reviews.author: B&C1015

customer_reviews.title: Good quality extender
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well extending bath faucet. We wanted to collect water in bucket but that would block the outlet. With the extension bucket can be kept away from faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Pradeep Thamanna

customer_reviews.title: Mold inside the spout
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing until I realized that mold can gather inside the spout and I can't even wash it out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Lol, no kids but my tub faucet sits too far back in my new house. Water goes all over the place. I needed something that didn't look like it was for a baby...this worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: nicole traini

customer_reviews.title: Makes bathtime for kids safer and easier.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It helps protect my kids from bumping into the spout. And makes it easier to wash my little girl's long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good. solved my purpose of safety as my son ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good.solved my purpose of safety as my son used to play with a metal spout all the time while bathing and I was worried if he will get hurt with that so bought this Aquaduck Bath spout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do what the picture shows. All it does is block the spout and no water comes out. Tried a bunch of ways to put the yellow part in and I can barely get the water to come out. My daughter can’t even enjoy this. Doesn’t do what the picture shows. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A great product for a fair price. It works just as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! It's super easy to put on my standard faucet and it puts the water right where I want it. It's soft so that when my older daughter is in the bathtub - it won't hurt her if she bumps into it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kackmo28

customer_reviews.title: Great use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since I’ve bought it! It’s great for my tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets Mildew/“moldy” very easy
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until I realized that you cannot leave it on because it gets all “moldy” extremely easy. I tried my best to clean it but it did not really all come off. So, I threw it away because I did not feel comfortable with my daughter using it anymore. :( stinks because it works great other than that major disappointing aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Skelley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for bathtub spout
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to extend the bathtub spout. This works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pollycharlie

customer_reviews.title: Best. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews, but this thing is so exceptionally well designed that I had to! Amazing price. Incredible durability. Easy to use, easy to clean. Makes filling my inflatable infant tub a whizz. Highly recommend over the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape Doesn’t fit tub faucet well. Water tends ...
customer_reviews.text: Odd shape Doesn’t fit tub faucet well. Water tends to spray oddly.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This has made filling my infant tub much easier. This has become part of my go to baby shower package.
customer_reviews.author: Amy V

customer_reviews.title: The kids like to play with it with their toys too and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our drain kept popping up when the water would hit it. This extends the water about 1/3 out of the tub. The kids like to play with it with their toys too and use it as a slide.
customer_reviews.author: NicSuss

customer_reviews.title: This works so great to keep the spout covered to avoid head bumps ...
customer_reviews.text: This works so great to keep the spout covered to avoid head bumps and to shoot the water outwards to help with rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: The yellow piece pulls off pretty easy so it's kinda a pain to have to put back on every time it's pulled off. Other than that, it worked great and created a little waterfall.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works great, until my 10 month old used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, until my 10 month old used it to pull up to standing and pulled the yellow part off. Now it never stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: My baby tub did not fit under bath water spout, so I had to fill it with a cup. With this I don’t! I put this on and water reaches baby tub!
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you wash your hair at the bathtub, this is for you! No longer do I have to contort my body or crane my neck to get my hair wet or rinse it. I wish I had one of these decades ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie Gee

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing and is an incredible product. Easy to use even on our curved spout in our large jacuzzi tub it can still reach the baby's bath to fill it up. Great that it's dishwasher safe and easy to mold to the spout. Such a brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this gets good reviews. My daughter loves the redirected water/spout & it helps with hair washing. However, the yellow tray comes out all the time & although I have a very standard faucet it slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: It is good to divert the water to the bucket
customer_reviews.author: Brett Young

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was all one piece, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was all one piece , but it works. Stays on the faucet without issue, even without having the drain stopper.
customer_reviews.author: MJDRCC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, needed this to put in my soaking tub, fits well and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Prasanna Bhattarai

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my bath spout. I find it very useful to wash things in the tub
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This works for what I needed- keeping the water flow away from the wall. Shape and design is versatile so if we change the spout or move to another house, this will work just fine. I plan to take it when we travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: ErinCH

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really helped in the morning sh!+ of '09 lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work as I thought it would. Water ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as I thought it would. Water actually comes out from the back and not the front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Our bathtub faucet is too short to fill up our infant tub properly. This extends the water flow perfectly so that the water goes right into the infant tub. I like how the "duck bill" part can be removed if desired. I'm totally happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Loved it! It fits my modern style spout and extends it so the water reaches the baby tub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits bathtub faucet
customer_reviews.text: Fits bathtub faucet! Easy to install and uninstall. Serves its purpose. No need to tip over baby tub to fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: riasupermomma

customer_reviews.title: Fits big faucets
customer_reviews.text: Only extender that fits my faucet. Like everything about it EXCEPT having to to adjust or put back the yellow plastic piece that falls out. Sort of a nuisance. Otherwise does its job.
customer_reviews.author: JustJ

customer_reviews.title: amazing and great!
customer_reviews.text: great slip on device on the shower spout, very efficient!!!
customer_reviews.author: padre19_redsox23

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and easy to use. the only downside is the tongue (yellow part) easily to move/adjust/fall down.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Tai

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it.  Thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves playing in this thing. Makes bath time more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Chan

customer_reviews.title: My tub spout does not have a knob to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: My tub spout does not have a knob to hold the duck spout. However it still worked well for me and my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand F.

customer_reviews.title: This gives it the reach w/o having to lift up on an angle and to not waste water.
customer_reviews.text: The toddler/baby tub we have doesn't align well with our tub spout. This gives it the reach w/o having to lift up on an angle and to not waste water.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sam Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great one!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! I was having difficulty filling my daughter’s bathtub. Now it’s very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: it pops off very easily. But
customer_reviews.text: Wish the extender stayed in more securely, it pops off very easily. But, does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great. FIts standard faucet
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Yes, the yellow extention comes off. But the main green/blue part stays on and protects baby from the faucet, which is it's main purpose. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: We initially loved it but wish it covered the lever to start ...
customer_reviews.text: We initially loved it but wish it covered the lever to start the shower. Also, when we moved and I pulled this off there was a black mold growing inside. I immediately threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Laul

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Works, but needs to be pushed back together regularly. The front part is plastic and fits into the blue part. The plastic part falls out occasionally. Another issue was the water can squirt out from the back, which was a problem in our claw foot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jmyburgh

customer_reviews.title: After mounting on tap, water flows from both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: After mounting on tap, water flows from both sides (straight forward and back). So, it has very weak water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Yura Volokitin

customer_reviews.title: Spout Falls Off
customer_reviews.text: Works well but had to super glue the yellow spout on because otherwise it will continue to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it to wash hair... works amazing for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has been a game changer for bathtime. Wish I would've known about it sooner! 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but moves very easily. With Spout removed most of the metal of ...
customer_reviews.text: Item works, but moves very easily. With Spout removed most of the metal of the front of the faucet is still exposed for child to hit head on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hope this works
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my faucet, hoping this works better than other one we tried. This seems to fit securely.

customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Product came apart several times and wouldn’t stay on faucet as it should.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for at a great price!

customer_reviews.title: we like it as our bathtub faucet was very short and ...
customer_reviews.text: we like it as our bathtub faucet was very short and we wanted an extender like this which was easy to give bath for our kid

customer_reviews.title: it works great and cost much less than trying to replace the ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits well over standard tub spouts. it works great and cost much less than trying to replace the spout with a longer one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit quite right
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick, but the fit is a little off. In order to get it far enough on that water doesn't run out the back, the top ends up lifting the knob on the faucet, so the shower also runs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid removes the yellow part...but at least the blue part covers the spout
customer_reviews.author: True stuff

product_meta.title: Aqueduck Bath Spout Extender Plus Cover
product_meta.description: The Aqueduck bath extender is a product created after speaking with numerous moms about bath time problems. Moms wanted a solution for filling baby bath tubs easily without wasting water and an easier way to rinse a toddler's hair without bumping their head on the faucet. My solution for these both time problems (and more) is the Aqueduck Bath Extender. It is fun and useful for kids and parents.
